member.name: T:RunGreaseWeazel.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:RunGreaseWeazel.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:RunGreaseWeazel.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:RunGreaseWeazel.frmMain.FrmMain_Load(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Sets the title of the Form with the form name plus exe version number

member.name: M:RunGreaseWeazel.frmMain.SetUpScreen
member.summary: Loads settings from VB My.Settings (local) and sets the variables onscreen. Also sets up tooltips.

member.name: M:RunGreaseWeazel.frmMain.EnableDarkTheme(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Simple attempt to create an easier to use night mode.
member.param: If true, set the program to dark, if not set to default

member.name: M:RunGreaseWeazel.frmMain.SaveSettings
member.summary: Write Settings out to VB.NET My.Settings section (All settings are per user)

member.name: M:RunGreaseWeazel.frmMain.CreateFileName(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Create a filename from the attributes onscreen. (Including checking if file exists, if necessary)
member.param: Check to see if the file exists on the disk. If so, append an integer to prevent GreaseSeazle from overwriting.

member.summary: Calls python.exe to run the gw.py script (Or run gw.exe directly in later versions)
member.param: Path to the python.exe. Python install folder must be in PATH variable.
Path to gw.py
Call the GreaseWeazle function to perform: Read, Write, Erase, Reset, Update, Set Pin Level as integer
Path to file to read/write
COM port to talk to GreaseWeazle hardware on. v0.11+ supports 'auto'.
The pin number (on the back of the floppy drive) to change value
Char: L or H denotes (L)ow 0v, or (H)igh 5v
Integer: Sets the drive RPM. This value gets processed first
Actually set the drive to spin using the RPM supplied
Bitcell rate. 250 for DD disks, 500 for HD disks.
Actually set the drive to reat using the bitcell rate supplied
Move the head to this cylinder/track.
First track to begin reading at. Can be overridden by the TrackSet track list.
Last track to end reading at. Can be overridden by the TrackSet track list.
Group of comma separated tracks to read/write/erase
Group of comma separated heads(disk sides) to read/write/erase
Creates a folder for each dump. Most useful for Kryoflux dumps.

member.name: M:RunGreaseWeazel.frmMain.CheckVisible
member.summary: Check to see which buttons, text boxes etc should be visible

member.name: M:RunGreaseWeazel.GreaseWeazle.UpdateWPC_Formats(System.String)
member.summary: Override the default list of disk formats for WPC
member.param: CSV list of strings representing disk formats

member.name: M:RunGreaseWeazel.GreaseWeazle.UpdateDriveSTR(System.String)
member.summary: Override the default list of F7 drives
member.param: CSV list of characters representing F7 drives it can access

member.name: P:RunGreaseWeazel.GreaseWeazle.TrackStep
member.summary: Number of tracks to move for each head step. Default is 1. Set to 2, to read a 40 track disk in an 80 track drive.

member.name: P:RunGreaseWeazel.GreaseWeazle.HeadOffsetEnable
member.summary: Enable to use 5.25" drives, to read 'Flippy' disks. eg C64 etc. Requires an offset set, to be effective.

member.name: P:RunGreaseWeazel.GreaseWeazle.FileName
member.summary: File to write, or to read to. File must exist to perform write.

member.name: P:RunGreaseWeazel.GreaseWeazle.Action
member.summary: The action to make the Greaseweazle perform. Read, write, erase, etc. 11 Commands supported so far.

member.name: P:RunGreaseWeazel.GreaseWeazle.EraseEmptyTracks
member.summary: When writing, perform an erase on empty tracks.

member.name: P:RunGreaseWeazel.GreaseWeazle.ExecuteScriptHidden
member.summary: Runs a windows exe or batch file with the path to the filename as the first argument

member.name: P:RunGreaseWeazel.GreaseWeazle.ExecuteScriptOnGWRead_Only
member.summary: Only run script/exe on 'READ' command
member.returns: True to run on Read, false to run on all actions.

member.name: P:RunGreaseWeazel.GreaseWeazle.F7Device
member.summary: Is the Greaseweazle an STM32F703 or STM32F103
member.returns: True for F7 device, false for F1 'bluepill' device

member.name: P:RunGreaseWeazel.GreaseWeazle.F7_Drive
member.summary: F7 drive selection. 'A' (PC Drive, with cable twist), 'B' (with no twist), or DS0-2 Shugart drives
member.returns: Returns PC Drive letter (A/B) or Shugart drive number (0-2)

member.name: P:RunGreaseWeazel.GreaseWeazle.SeekTrack
member.summary: The cylinder/track to find using the 'Seek' command. Track numbers are zero based.

member.name: P:RunGreaseWeazel.GreaseWeazle.ErrorString
member.summary: Last Error string as readable text.

member.name: M:RunGreaseWeazel.GreaseWeazle.ExecuteGW
member.summary: Main function. Make the GW perform an action
member.returns: True if GW performed action, false if there was an error. Check ErrorString.
